author: Becky Noble
title: AOC Says Capitalism ‘Not A Redeemable System’

sentence: OPINION: Call it what it is: the “Reelect Vulnerable Democrats Act.” When Senate Democrats Mark Kelly of Arizona and Maggie Hassan of New Hampshire proposed a temporary tax cut on gasoline last week, they unwittingly highlighted two of the dirtiest secrets of the green agenda.
author: Larry Behrens
title: Democrats trying to shuffle the deckchairs on their sinking poll numbers

sentence: Richard Burr (R-NC), Bill Cassidy (R-LA), Susan Collins (R-ME), Chris Coons (D-DE), Lindsey Graham (R-SC), Maggie Hassan (D-NH), John Hickenlooper (D-CO), Mark Kelly (D-AZ), Angus King (I-ME), Joe Manchin (D-WV), Jerry Moran (R-KS), Lisa Murkowski (R-AK), Rob Portman (R-OH), Mitt Romney (R-UT), Mike Rounds (R-SD), Jeanne Shaheen (D-NH), Kyrsten Sinema (D-AZ), Jon Tester (D-MT), Thom Tillis (R-NC), Mark Warner (D-VA), and Todd Young (R-IN).

title: Watch As Queen Pelosi BLOWS UP On National Television- ” If Her Radical Demands Aren’t Met She’s Going To Do THIS”
